sentences.en: Activated carbon, alumina are often used to remove many types of organic materials from aqueous streams.
sentences.cn: 常用活性炭, 铝矾土来去除废水中各种类型的有机物.

sentences.en: After setting, the surfaces of the specimens are ground down using carborundum and alumina.
sentences.cn: 凝固之后, 样品表面连续用金钢砂或氧化铝磨平.

sentences.en: Alumina import bans have been exacted against smelters with capacity below mts.
sentences.cn: 氧化铝的进口禁令严格限制生产能力在100,000吨以下的冶炼商.

sentences.en: At last, some advices about the alumina concentration control were put forward.
sentences.cn: 最后对于氧化铝浓度控制的发展提出了展望.

sentences.en: Celite, alumina, XAD - 7, Kiselgel and Florisil were selected to absorb HRP.
sentences.cn: 不同载体对酶的影响不同.Celite, alumina, XAD - 7, Kiselgel和 Florisil为载体,分别以吸附法制备固定化酶.

sentences.en: Factors influencing pore structure of amorphous silica - alumina prepared by carbonization were investigated.
sentences.cn: 摘要系统考察了影响碳化法制备无定形 硅铝 孔结构的因素.

sentences.en: High temperature reaction of quartz, alumina, kaolin and sodium carbonate was examined.
sentences.cn: 本文考查了石英 、 三氧化二铝及高岭石与纯碱在高温条件下的反应过程.

sentences.en: However, the alumina layers spall as the temperature increases.
sentences.cn: 但是, 氧化铝层剥落的温度升高.

sentences.en: It has significance for reducing steam consumption of alumina production.
sentences.cn: 对降低成本节能降耗具有重要的意义.

sentences.en: Methods outlined in the monograph include: use of crushed clay pots, bone charcoal, contact precipitation, or use of activated alumina (absorptive filter).
sentences.cn: 专著中概述的方法包括：使用粗砂壶、骨炭、接触沉淀，或使用活性氧化铝（吸收型过滤器）。

sentences.en: The alumina ceramics is of good properties and widely used.
sentences.cn: 氧化铝陶瓷具有良好的性能,故应用广泛.

sentences.en: The increased investment in alumina production eased the short supply of alumina.
sentences.cn: 氧化铝投资热情高涨,氧化铝供应矛盾缓解.

sentences.en: The synthesis methods of magnesia - alumina spinel are electro - fusion and sintering process.
sentences.cn: 镁铝尖晶石的合成方法有电熔法和烧结法.

sentences.en: Thermal conductivity of grit and alumina powder was measured by the system.
sentences.cn: 用实验装置测量了沙子和氧化铝粉末的导热系数.

sentences.en: This paper presents a novel production process of alumina by using isooctanol.
sentences.cn: 研究了利用异辛醇和金属铝制备高纯氧化铝的工艺.

sentences.en: To alumina, the production of high - frequency ceramic - based industrial ceramics.
sentences.cn: 以氧化铝 、 高频瓷生产的工业陶瓷为主.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 高铝水泥；快干水泥；矾土水泥
